# Deconversion
When mounting an effort to thwart the [color=#4cabb3]Cosmic Cult[/color], there are several methods the crew might employ to ensure their survival and safety. One of these methods is [color=Yellow]Deconversion[/color]. Crew that are suspected of malign infection can be subjected to the [color=Yellow]Containment Oubliette[/color], which is a scientific device capable of expunging most forms of anomalous influence.
## Suppression Methods
Deconversion is but one method for dealing with an encroaching cult. Crew aboard the station may alternatively wish to invest in [color=Green]Mindshield[/color] implanters.
These state-of-the-art devices can prevent outside influences from brainwashing crewmembers, providing a powerful utility against the cult's influence.
